data

Class Sink

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Sink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CarAcceptor

    public final class Sink
extends java.lang.Object
implements CarAcceptor
    A sink is the end point of the last CarAcceptor. It catches all of the car Objects and removes them.
    Author:
    athina
